toolbox.js.name: InPageEdit Toolbox
toolbox.js.author: Dragon-Fish
toolbox.js.description: Adds a toolbox in the bottom-right corner of your screen. Lets you quickly access frequently used IPE functions.

edit-any-page.js.name: Edit any page
edit-any-page.js.author: Dragon-Fish
edit-any-page.js.description: Adds a button into IPE Toolbox that lets you edit any page anywhere

wiki-editor.js.name: WikiEditor
wiki-editor.js.description: Make InPageEdit use native WikiEditor (2010 editor) instead of IPE's custom editTools.
wiki-editor.js.author: Dragon-Fish

code-mirror/script.js.name: [BETA] Code Mirror
code-mirror/script.js.description: Syntaxhighlight editor for InPageEdit. Currently supported languages: Wikitext, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, Lua.
code-mirror/script.js.author: InPageEdit

color-preview.js.name: Color preview
color-preview.js.author: Dragon-Fish
color-preview.js.description: Adds a box above the edit textarea to quickly preview the hexadecimal color

quick-thank.js.name: Quick thank
quick-thank.js.author: Leranjun
quick-thank.js.description: Adds a button into IPE Toolbox that lets you thank any page anywhere

fix-double-entrance.js.name: Fix double entrance
fix-double-entrance.js.description: Fix the bug that two Quick Edit link appear in section edit area when the Visual Editor is enabled
